example.title: Code listing: XML describing a YDXmlForm object
example.programlisting: <form name="form1" method="post" action="/ydframework/examples/form_xml.php" target="_self"> <attributes> </attributes> <elements> <element name="txt" type="text"> <labels> <label id="default" value="Enter text:" /> </labels> <values> <value id="default" value="" /> </values> <attributes> </attributes> <options> </options> </element> <element name="cmdSubmit" type="submit"> <labels> <label id="default" value="" /> </labels> <values> <value id="default" value="submit" /> </values> <attributes> </attributes> <options> </options> </element> </elements> <rules> </rules> <comparerules> </comparerules> <filters> </filters> </form>
